projects.title: Dev Portfolio
projects.bodyText:
- Developer Portfolio Website made in React
 -  Fully customisable and dynamic, easily change data and images.
 - Dark Mode Support

projects.title: AI-Powered Assignment Generator
projects.bodyText: - Built an NLP system using Hugging Face's BERT/RoBERTa models to analyze course materials and automatically generate assignment questions and answers for professors.

projects.title: Personal Resume Analyzer
projects.bodyText: - Developed a Python tool using spaCy and PyResParser to automatically extract and organize key details (skills, education, experience) from resumes for quick personal profile updates and portfolio management.
